CustomField.description: This field will have reference to implement look up filter criteria because of limitation to implement look up filter with multi-select picklist field
CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( FS_Platform__c , "6000"), "6000;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( FS_Platform__c , "6050"), "6050;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( FS_Platform__c , "7000"), "7000;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( FS_Platform__c , "7100"), "7100;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( FS_Platform__c , "8000"), "8000;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( FS_Platform__c , "9000"), "9000;", NULL) + IF(INCLUDES( FS_Platform__c , "9100"), "9100;", NULL)
CustomField.label: Platform Applicable
